attributes.action: Make sure that full valid Police Clearance Checks are provided before anyone is allowed to work with children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come out from the Home Office that Police Clearance Checks have been skipped or been done for someone lying about their name. This puts children in very serious risks as they could be (in the very worst cases) murderers or rapists. You should have no worries about letting your child go to school, nursery etc. but without knowing if the staff are safe you can't reassure yourself enough.
